name: 賴名亮　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.
